capabilityDescription.en: Sends the content of a FlowFile as a notification to the Amazon Simple Notification Service
capabilityDescription.zh: 将FlowFile的内容作为通知发送到Amazon Simple notification Service

en.description: User specified dynamic Properties are added as attributes to the notification

zh.description: 用户指定的动态属性将作为属性添加到通知中

en.description: Specifies an optional SSL Context Service that, if provided, will be used to create connections

zh.description: 指定可选的SSL上下文服务（如果提供），将用于创建连接

en.description: The token used for deduplication of sent messages

zh.description: 用于对已发送邮件进行重复数据消除的令牌

en.description: If using FIFO, the message group to which the flowFile belongs

zh.description: 如果使用FIFO，flowFile所属的消息组

en.description: The name of the resource to which notifications should be published

zh.description: 应向其发布通知的资源的名称

en.description: Endpoint URL to use instead of the AWS default including scheme, host, port, and path. The AWS libraries select an endpoint URL based on the AWS region, but this property overrides the selected endpoint URL, allowing use with other S3-compatible endpoints.

zh.description: 要使用的端点URL，而不是AWS默认值，包括方案、主机、端口和路径。AWS库根据AWS区域选择一个端点URL，但此属性覆盖所选的端点URL，允许与其他S3兼容的端点一起使用。

en.description: If true, the contents of the FlowFile must be JSON with a top-level element named 'default'. Additional elements can be used to send different messages to different protocols. See the Amazon SNS Documentation for more information.

zh.description: 如果为true，则FlowFile的内容必须是JSON，并带有名为“default”的顶级元素。可以使用附加的元素向不同的协议发送不同的消息。有关更多信息，请参阅Amazon SNS文档。

en.description: The optional subject to use for any subscribers that are subscribed via E-mail

zh.description: 可供通过电子邮件订阅的任何订户使用的可选主题

en.description: The type of Amazon Resource Name that is being used.

zh.description: 正在使用的Amazon资源名称的类型。

en.description: The character set in which the FlowFile's content is encoded

zh.description: 对FlowFile内容进行编码的字符集

en.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

zh.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

failure.en: FlowFiles are routed to failure relationship

success.en: FlowFiles are routed to success relationship
